short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleashed Inventory Utility: Generate unique customer/supplier/product Codes (Control + c) and 12-digit barcodes (Control + b)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleashed Inventory Utility: 

Customer, Supplier and Product Codes need to be unique but it may be unnecessarily time-consuming to keep making up such unique codes every time you want to add a customer or supplier.

This utility generates unique/random:
customer/supplier/product Codes: (Control + c) and; 
12-digit barcodes (Control + b)
